q3_revenue.description: Must extract Q3 2025 total net sales of $180,169 million

q3_operating_income.description: Must extract Q3 2025 operating income of $17,422 million

q3_diluted_eps.description: Must extract Q3 2025 diluted EPS of $1.95

q4_revenue_guidance.description: Must extract Q4 2025 revenue guidance range ($206B - $213B)

q4_operating_income_guidance.description: Must extract Q4 2025 operating income guidance range ($21B - $26B)

summary_accuracy.description: Are all facts, figures, and claims in the summary accurate and traceable to the source documents?

summary_completeness.description: Does the summary cover key topics: segment performance (AWS, retail), revenue growth, margin trends, and forward guidance context?

summary_insight.description: Does the summary provide useful insights beyond just restating numbers - e.g., YoY comparisons, trend analysis, strategic implications?

summary_structure.description: Is the summary well-organized, appropriately sized (300-500 words), and written in professional language suitable for senior bankers?
